title: Remove the "Statistics" block from the employer page only

requirements.text: Remove the entire "Статистика" (Statistics) UI block from the employer page (My Official Profile page) in `frontend/src/pages/MyOfficialProfilePage.tsx`, without changing any other content, styling, layout, behavior, data fetching, or business logic on the page or elsewhere in the app.

quotes: Искам да премахнеш блока "Статистика" в страницата на работодател без да променяш нищо друго

acceptanceCriteria: On the employer page (My Official Profile), the card/section titled "Статистика" is no longer rendered.
No other sections on the page are removed, reordered, restyled, or functionally changed (e.g., company data section, rating history section, modals, navigation).
The app builds successfully after removal.

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be modified: `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts`, `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/main.tsx`, and anything under `frontend/src/components/ui`.
Do not change any other UI content, styling, layout, or behavior outside removing the single Statistics block.
Keep backend architecture unchanged (single Motoko actor); do not introduce schema/state changes.
nonGoals: Translating Bulgarian UI strings to English.
Refactoring or optimizing related metrics computations, hooks, or imports unless strictly required to keep the build passing.
Changing what data is fetched for the employer page.
